request_0.formal_statement:
lemma factorization_property:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x \<noteq> y"
  shows "(xy - 2)(x - y) = 0 \<Longrightarrow> xy = 2"

request_1.formal_statement:
lemma distinct_nonzero_product:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x \<noteq> 0" "y \<noteq> 0" "x \<noteq> y"
  shows "x + 2/x = y + 2/y ⟹ x * y = 2"

request_2.formal_statement:
lemma cross_multiply:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x ≠ 0" "y ≠ 0" "x ≠ y"
  shows "(x + 2/x = y + 2/y) ⟹ (x - y) * x * y = 2 * (x - y)"

request_3.formal_statement:
lemma manipulate_equation:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x + 2/x = y + 2/y"
    and "x \<noteq> y"
  shows "xy = 2"

request_4.formal_statement:
lemma common_denominator:
  fixes a b c d :: real
  assumes "b \<noteq> 0" "d \<noteq> 0"
  shows "(a/b) - (c/d) = (ad - bc) / (bd)"

request_5.formal_statement:
lemma factorization:
  fixes a b :: real
  shows "a - b = (a - b) * 1"

request_6.formal_statement:
lemma common_denominator:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x + 2/x = y + 2/y"
  shows "x - y = (2x - 2y) / (xy)"

request_7.formal_statement:
lemma factor_out:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x + 2/x = y + 2/y"
    and "x \<noteq> y"
  shows "x - y = (2(x - y)) / (xy)"

request_8.formal_statement:
lemma divide_both_sides:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x + 2/x = y + 2/y" 
      and "x \<noteq> 0" 
      and "y \<noteq> 0"
      and "x \<noteq> y"
  shows "1 = 2 / (xy)"

request_9.formal_statement:
lemma cross_multiplication:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x \<noteq> 0" "y \<noteq> 0"
  shows "(x + 2/x = y + 2/y) \<longrightarrow> (x - y) * xy = 2 * (x - y)"

request_10.formal_statement:
lemma cross_multiply:
  fixes a b c d :: real
  assumes "b ≠ 0" "d ≠ 0"
  shows "(a/b = c/d) ⟷ (a * d = b * c)"

request_11.formal_statement:
lemma distinct_real_numbers:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x ≠ y"
  shows "x + 2/x = y + 2/y ⟹ xy = 2"

request_12.formal_statement:
lemma algebraic_manipulation:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x + 2/x = y + 2/y"
  shows "x - y + 2 * (y - x) / (x * y) = 0"

request_13.formal_statement:
lemma factor_difference:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x \<noteq> y"
  shows "(x - y) * (1 - 2/(x * y)) = 0"

request_14.formal_statement:
lemma cross_multiply:
  fixes a b c d :: real
  assumes "b \<noteq> 0" and "d \<noteq> 0"
  shows "(a/b = c/d) \<longleftrightarrow> (a * d = b * c)"

request_15.formal_statement:
lemma rational_expression_manipulation:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x \<noteq> 0" "y \<noteq> 0"
  shows "x + 2/x = y + 2/y \<longleftrightarrow> (x - y)(xy + 2) = 0"

request_16.formal_statement:
lemma factorization_lemma:
  fixes a b c :: real
  assumes "a \<noteq> b"
  shows "(a - b)(c + d) = 0 \<longleftrightarrow> c + d = 0"

request_17.formal_statement:
lemma distinct_product_relation:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x \<noteq> y" "x + 2/x = y + 2/y"
  shows "xy = 2"

request_18.formal_statement:
lemma distinct_variable_relationship:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x ≠ y"
  shows "x = 2/y ⟹ y = 2/x"

request_19.formal_statement:
lemma distinct_nonzero:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x \<noteq> 0" 
    and "y \<noteq> 0" 
    and "x \<noteq> y"
  shows "x * y \<noteq> 0"
